gloss: break into simpler molecules by means of heat / make a compound react with water and undergo hydrolysis / unite chemically so that the product is easily broken down into the original compounds
the chemical process in which a nitro group is added to an organic compound (or substituted for another group in an organic compound)
put down by force or intimidation
divide into two opposing groups or kinds / divided or dividing into two sharply distinguished parts or classifications / separate with or as if with an instrument
